item.title: Beocord 9000: Rebuilding the Pinch (Rubber) Roller
item.description:
The last step in restoring my Beocord 9000 is fixing the worn-out pinch roller, a common problem in these decks given their age. These decks are over 30 years old, surpassing the lifespan of most rubber components. For optimal performance, a pinch roller rebuild is essential. Fortunately, Terry Witt of Terry’s Rubber Rollers & Wheels is an expert in restoring tape rollers. He is highly regarded in the field, as evidenced by his reputation on online forums...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beocord-9000-rebuilding-the-pinch-rubber-roller/
